Student_ApplicationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_ApplicationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

COD_Attendance_Dates_Data.description: Reference to a Student Award Item
Anticipated Disbursement Date of the Student Award for the first Academic Period in the Academic Year
Anticipated Disbursement Date of the Student Award for the second Academic Period in the Academic Year

description: Element Container for Put COD Attendance Dates Request containing the identifying fields Academic Record or Student Application, Award Year, Award Item and Sequence Number, and the data fields Academic Year Start and End Dates, Loan Period Start and End Dates, and First and Second Anticipated Disbursement Dates

validation.validation: Element Content 'Second_Anticipated_Disbursement_Date' is required, on internal element 'Put COD Attendance Dates Request'
Element Content 'First_Anticipated_Disbursement_Date' is invalid. The Award for the first Academic Period included in the Academic Year is already disbursed.

The Student Award Grouper for the provided Student Application Reference or Academic Record Reference, Award Year Reference, Award Item Reference, and Sequence Number is invalid. At least one Student Award in the Student Award Grouper must be a loan, be for a BBAY3 Academic Period, and be not disbursed. All Student Awards in the Student Award Grouper must have COD Status not equal to 'Transmitted'.
No Student Award Grouper for the provided Student Application Reference or Academic Record Reference, Award Year Reference, Award Item Reference, and Sequence Number
Element Content 'First_Anticipated_Disbursement_Date' is required, on internal element 'Put COD Attendance Dates Request'
Element Content 'Second_Anticipated_Disbursement_Date' is invalid. The Award for the second Academic Period included in the Academic Year is already disbursed.
Loan Period Start Date must be before Loan Period End Date.
First Anticipated Disbursement Date must be before Second Anticipated Disbursement Date.
Academic Year Start Date must be before Academic Year End Date.
